marklogic.body: I am really looking forward to episode 19! -I was watching the Panel videos this morning and watching fans ask the questions made me ask myself, what would I have asked? -and I had this crazy thought when they said 19 was "epic and Scope" along with the fact they were vague on Observer questions...I realized I would ask, Will we ever get a glimpse into the timeline/time period that the Observers come from? -Does it still exist? Is there a"home" for them to go to?---and then I thought what if there isn't anymore...and that's why they are doing what they do? --Like Peter they are trying to "recreate" the 'timeline' they came from, because they lost or destroyed it...There are a lot of David Bowie references, and the Observers look like the Martians from "The Man Who Fell to Earth"...Bowie's character, Thomas Jerome Newton (Cough Cough) left Mars to get the resources he needed to save his family...Then what if episode 19 is a flash back to the time the Observers and the people they work for lost their universes?? Then Peter's story mirrors theirs.
